summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 39th Avenue Southwest, from West Juneau Street to West Myrtle Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9562 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
